title: SemantIQ-M-Benchmarks: A Unified Framework for Multimodal AI Evaluation
description: SemantIQ-M-Benchmarks is an open-source framework for evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs) and Multimodal Models. It includes the Semantic Maturity Framework (SMF), Human-AI Cognitive Symmetry (HACS) protocols, and Vision benchmarking tools. This repository provides the CLI, Web UI, and standard datasets for reproducible evaluation.
